message: I think a 60/40 split is fairer, reflecting the different inflation rates we're facing.
Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to give you a better deal, but we need to come to an agreement soon before the inflation makes this deal worthless.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more
Time is running out. Let's split it evenly and call it a day. We both lose a lot more if we keep rejecting each other's offers.
